name: Hide Froggy !
description:
A little frog want's some flies at midnight, go eat them !  

Unfortunately your little snack might be disturb by witches in search of frog eyes, avoid them by hiding in the bush !

Game created in a limited time for the trijam but  for the upload, hope you gonna like it for a first game.

Music by Fabian

Art by

Code by Joris Pineda
